verbs.description: [ARG0: israel] [V: warns] [ARG2: hamas] [ARG1: of painful strikes] [ARGM-ADV: if protests go on] [C-ARG0: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu] [C-ARG1: on sunday threatened very painful blows against gaza hamas rulers if they do n't halt protests along the perimeter fence that have led to clashes with israeli troops netanyahu said israel is very close to waging a different kind of activity against the islamic militants he said if it has any sense hamas will cease its fire and violent outbursts israel prime minister benjamin netanyahu defense minister avigdor lieberman gaza strip prime minister hamas gaza jerusalem benjamin netanyahu]

israel warns hamas of painful strikes if [ARG1: protests] [V: go] on [C-ARG1: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu] [ARGM-TMP: on sunday] threatened very painful blows against gaza hamas rulers if they do n't halt protests along the perimeter fence that have led to clashes with israeli troops netanyahu said israel is very close to waging a different kind of activity against the islamic militants he said if it has any sense hamas will cease its fire and violent outbursts israel prime minister benjamin netanyahu defense minister avigdor lieberman gaza strip prime minister hamas gaza jerusalem benjamin netanyahu

israel warns hamas of painful strikes if protests go on israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu on sunday threatened very painful blows against gaza hamas rulers if they [V: do] n't halt protests along the perimeter fence that have led to clashes with israeli troops netanyahu said israel is very close to waging a different kind of activity against the islamic militants he said if it has any sense hamas will cease its fire and violent outbursts israel prime minister benjamin netanyahu defense minister avigdor lieberman gaza strip prime minister hamas gaza jerusalem benjamin netanyahu
